Pre-Game Insights: France are one of the undisputed favourites for Euro 2024 glory
Deschamps's men should encounter few roadblocks en route to another straightforward triumph
Miscellaneous Highlights: This marked the second-ever meeting between France and Canada

Deschamps has been handed an untimely defensive scare ahead of Sunday's friendly and indeed the Euros, as Bayern Munich centre-back Dayot Upamecano was withdrawn at half time in the win over Luxembourg
Others: France's possible starting lineup: Maignan; Kounde, Saliba, Konate, Hernandez; Rabiot, Kante; Dembele, Griezmann, Mbappe; Thuram
Canada's possible starting lineup: St. Clair; Laryea, Miller, Cornelius, Davies; Buchanan, Eustaquio, Kone, Hoilett; David, Larin
